results.title: Svelte Tutorial for Beginners - Full Course
results.description: Learn Svelte from scratch in this comprehensive tutorial. We'll cover components, reactivity, stores, and more!

results.title: Build a Real-World App with Svelte and TypeScript
results.description: In this project-based tutorial, we'll build a complete application using Svelte, TypeScript, and modern web development practices.

results.title: Svelte vs React - Which Should You Choose?
results.description: A detailed comparison of Svelte and React. We'll look at performance, developer experience, and real-world use cases.
